verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In the secret, in the quiet place In the stillness You are there In the secret, in the quiet hour I wait only for You ‘Cause I want to know You more.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I want to know You I want to hear Your voice I want to know You more I want to touch You I want to see Your face I want to know You more{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I am reaching for the highest goal That I might receive the prize Pressing onward Pushing every hindrance aside, out of my way ‘Cause I want to know You more.{/lang-eng}
